data.event: As such, much of its economy is based around the summer months.
The North Lake Correctional Facility is a private, for-profit, maximum security prison that was constructed in the late 1990s by the Wackenhut Corrections Co., which has since become the GEO Group.
In June 2015, 280 high security inmates convicted of crimes in the state of Vermont arrived from out-of-state prisons to the Baldwin facility.
